title: Disclaimer
intro: By Accessing RupieTimes.Com, You Acknowledge That You Have Read, Understood, And Agree To Be Bound By The Terms Of This Disclaimer And User Notice.

sections.title: General Information
sections.content: Rupie Times Is A Digital Financial Publication Owned And Operated By Rupie Times Media. The Content Published On This Website, Newsletters, And Associated Platforms Is For General Information, Market Analysis, And Educational Purposes Only. We Collect, Compile, And Present Data And Insights From Reliable Public Sources, Research Reports, And Expert Opinions. While Every Effort Is Made To Ensure Accuracy And Timeliness, Rupie Times Does Not Guarantee The Completeness, Correctness, Or Reliability Of Any Information Contained Herein. The Views And Opinions Expressed By Authors, Analysts, Or Contributors Are Their Own And Do Not Necessarily Reflect The Views Of Rupie Times Or Its Management. Readers Are Advised To Exercise Discretion And Verify Information Independently Before Making Any Financial Or Investment Decisions.

sections.title: Nature Of Content
sections.content: The Articles, Stories, Or Analyses Published On Rupie Times Are Journalistic And Educational In Nature. They Are Intended To Provide Readers With Context, Perspective, And Understanding Of Financial Developments. Nothing On This Website Constitutes Investment Advice, Recommendation, Or Solicitation To Buy Or Sell Securities, Mutual Funds, Derivatives, Or Any Other Financial Instruments. Rupie Times Does Not Undertake Portfolio Management, Financial Planning, Client Suitability Assessment, Or Any Personalized Investment Advisory Services. Readers And Subscribers Should Consult A SEBI-Registered Investment Adviser Or Research Analyst For Specific Investment Recommendations Tailored To Their Financial Objectives And Risk Appetite.

sections.title: Regulatory & Compliance Position
sections.content:
Our Publication And Its Contributors Operate Purely In The Field Of Financial Journalism And Information Dissemination. Rupie Times Does Not Function As An Investment Adviser Or Research Analyst Under The SEBI (Investment Advisers) Regulations, 2013 Or SEBI (Research Analysts) Regulations, 2014. Any Analytical Views, Sector Reviews, Or Opinions Published Are Meant For Informational And Educational Purposes And Must Not Be Interpreted As A Registered Advisory Or Research Service.

In Cases Where Content From Third-Party SEBI-Registered Advisers Or Analysts Is Featured, The Source And SEBI Registration Details (As Provided By The Contributor) Will Be Clearly Disclosed. Rupie Times Acts Only As A Publishing Platform For Such Material And Has No Financial Interest In The Securities Or Recommendations Discussed Therein.

sections.title: Independence And Conflicts Of Interest
sections.content: Rupie Times Operates Independently Of All Brokerages, Promoters, Corporates, Or Financial Institutions. Editorial Decisions Are Taken Without Any Influence From Advertisers Or Market Participants. We Do Not Accept Compensation, Inducement, Or Consideration Of Any Kind That Is Linked To The Performance Of Any Security, Company, Or Trading Activity.

sections.title: Sponsored & Partner Content
sections.content: Certain Articles Or Features May Be Presented In Association With Brands Or Advertisers. All Such Content Will Be Clearly Labeled As “Sponsored”, “Advertorial”, Or “Partner Content.” Sponsored Articles Are Provided For Information Only And Do Not Represent The Editorial Opinion Of Rupie Times. They Should Not Be Construed As Investment Recommendations Or Endorsements.

sections.title: Forward-Looking Statements
sections.content: Some Articles May Include Forward-Looking Views Or Projections Based On Current Market Trends, Data, Or Expectations. Such Statements Involve Risks And Uncertainties, And Actual Results May Differ Materially. Rupie Times Assumes No Obligation To Update Such Statements.

sections.title: Third-Party Links & External Content
sections.content: RupieTimes.Com May Contain Hyperlinks To Third-Party Websites For Reader Convenience. Rupie Times Is Not Responsible For The Content, Accuracy, Or Reliability Of External Sites, Nor Does Inclusion Imply Endorsement. Users Access Such Sites At Their Own Risk.

sections.title: Data, Tools & Delivery
sections.content: Market Data, Charts, And Indicators May Be Sourced From Third-Party Vendors And Public Platforms. While We Aim To Provide Accurate Information, We Do Not Guarantee Uninterrupted Service Or Real-Time Accuracy. Delivery Of Newsletters, Email Alerts, Or Notifications May Be Delayed Or Disrupted Due To Internet, Network, Or Technical Issues Beyond Our Control.

sections.title: Risk Disclosure
sections.content: Stock Market Investing And Trading Involve Substantial Risk Of Loss. Past Performance Is Not Indicative Of Future Results. Mid-Cap, Small-Cap, And Sectoral Investments May Show Higher Volatility And Liquidity Risks. Readers Are Urged To Perform Independent Due Diligence And Seek Advice From Qualified Professionals Before Acting On Any Information Provided Herein.

sections.title: Liability Limitation
sections.content: Rupie Times, Its Owners, Editors, And Contributors Shall Not Be Liable For Any Direct, Indirect, Incidental, Consequential, Or Punitive Damages, Loss Of Profit, Or Loss Of Data Arising From The Use Of Our Content Or Services. Readers Use All Information At Their Own Risk And Discretion.

sections.title: Copyright & Ownership
sections.content: All Text, Graphics, And Design Elements Appearing On RupieTimes.Com Are The Property Of Rupie Times Media Unless Otherwise Stated. Unauthorized Reproduction, Redistribution, Or Modification Of Content In Any Form Is Prohibited Without Written Permission.

sections.title: Jurisdiction
sections.content: This Website Is Operated And Managed From India. All Matters, Claims, Or Disputes Shall Fall Under The Exclusive Jurisdiction Of Courts In Mumbai, India, And Governed By The Laws Of The Republic Of India.
